channel.title: People keep geting Dc'd when they try to log in & another question
channel.description:
It dcd me like 10times before it let me use it and now it works fine but when people try to log in it dc's them and you know how they just say f it and move on to the next server, so i want to know whats causing this problem, also when this happens and they stop trying to log in it dc's me as well [URL=http://img829.imageshack.us/i/92037259.png/][IMG]http://img829.imageshack.us/img829/6549/92037259.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL] ~~~~
scroll ---->>>> sorry also how do i make myself a donator i cant seem to find it in my char file
